001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json;
003
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.io.InputStream;
006import java.util.*;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.*;
011import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule;
012import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
013import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
014import com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsr310.JavaTimeModule;
015
016import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.modules.ModuleOptions;
017import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.modules.ZonedDateTimeDeserializationModule;
018import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.modules.ZonedDateTimeSerializationModule;
019
020/**
021 * Class with methods to customize the JSON serialization/deserialization
022 */
023public class JsonUtils {
024
025    private static final ObjectMapper OBJECT_MAPPER;
026
027    static {
028        OBJECT_MAPPER = createObjectMapper();
029    }
030
031    /**
032     * creates a new {@link ObjectMapper } instance
033     * @return ObjectMapper
034     */
035    public static ObjectMapper createObjectMapper() {
036        return createObjectMapper(name -> null);
037    }
038
039    /**
040     *
041     * @param options configuration for jackson modules supplied by a {@link ModuleSupplier}
042     * @return ObjectMapper
043     */
044    public static ObjectMapper createObjectMapper(final ModuleOptions options) {
045        ServiceLoader<SimpleModule> loader = ServiceLoader.load(SimpleModule.class,
046            SimpleModule.class.getClassLoader());
047
048        ServiceLoader<ModuleSupplier> suppliers = ServiceLoader.load(ModuleSupplier.class,
049            ModuleSupplier.class.getClassLoader());
050        final List<SimpleModule> moduleList = new ArrayList<>();
051        suppliers.iterator().forEachRemaining(moduleSupplier -> moduleList.add(moduleSupplier.getModule(options)));
052
053        final ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();
054        objectMapper.registerModule(new JavaTimeModule()) //provides serialization and deserialization for LocalDate and LocalTime (JSR310 Jackson module)
055                .registerModule(new ZonedDateTimeSerializationModule()) //custom serializer for LocalDate, LocalTime and ZonedDateTime
056                .registerModule(new ZonedDateTimeDeserializationModule()) //custom deserializer for ZonedDateTime
057                .registerModules(loader)
058                .registerModules(moduleList)
059                .setSerializationInclusion(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL) //ignore null fields
060                .configure(DeserializationFeature.FAIL_ON_UNKNOWN_PROPERTIES, false)
061                .configure(SerializationFeature.FAIL_ON_EMPTY_BEANS, false);
062        return objectMapper;
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * serializes the given object to JSON as a byte array
067     * @param value object to be serialized
068     * @return json byte array
069     * @throws JsonProcessingException serialization errors
070     */
071    public static byte[] toJsonByteArray(final Object value) throws JsonProcessingException {
072        return OBJECT_MAPPER.writeValueAsBytes(value);
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * serializes the given object to JSON as a byte array
077     * @param value object to be serialized
078     * @return json string
079     * @throws JsonProcessingException serialization errors
080     */
081    public static String toJsonString(final Object value) throws JsonProcessingException {
082        return OBJECT_MAPPER.writeValueAsString(value);
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * deserializes the given json string to the given class
087     * @param clazz class to serialize to
088     * @param content json as string
089     * @return deserialized object
090     * @throws IOException deserialization errors
091     */
092    public static <T> T fromJsonString(final String content, final Class<T> clazz) throws IOException {
093        return OBJECT_MAPPER.readValue(content, clazz);
094    }
095
096    /**
097     * deserializes the given json string to the given class
098     * @param clazz class to serialize to
099     * @param content json as byte array
100     * @return deserialized object
101     * @throws IOException deserialization errors
102     */
103    public static <T> T fromJsonByteArray(final byte[] content, final Class<T> clazz) throws IOException {
104        return OBJECT_MAPPER.readValue(content, clazz);
105    }
106
107    /**
108     * deserializes the given json string to the given class
109     * @param clazz class to serialize to
110     * @param content json as inputstream
111     * @return deserialized object
112     * @throws IOException deserialization errors
113     */
114    public static <T> T fromInputStream(final InputStream content, final Class<T> clazz) throws IOException {
115        return OBJECT_MAPPER.readValue(content, clazz);
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * default {@link ObjectMapper}
120     * @return ObjectMapper
121     */
122    public static ObjectMapper getConfiguredObjectMapper() {
123        return OBJECT_MAPPER;
124    }
125
126    /**
127     * Very simple way to "erase" passwords -
128     * replaces all field values whose names contains {@code 'pass'} by {@code '**removed from output**'}.
129     * @param node Json object to be redacted
130     * @return Json object
131     */
132    private static JsonNode secure(final JsonNode node) {
133        if (node.isObject()) {
134            ObjectNode objectNode = (ObjectNode) node;
135            Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JsonNode>> fields = node.fields();
136            while (fields.hasNext()) {
137                Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> field = fields.next();
138                if (field.getValue().isTextual() && (field.getKey().toLowerCase().contains("pass")
139                        || field.getKey().toLowerCase().contains("access_token")
140                        || field.getKey().toLowerCase().contains("refresh_token"))) {
141                    objectNode.put(field.getKey(), "**removed from output**");
142                }
143                else {
144                    secure(field.getValue());
145                }
146            }
147            return objectNode;
148        }
149        else if (node.isArray()) {
150            ArrayNode arrayNode = (ArrayNode) node;
151            Iterator<JsonNode> elements = arrayNode.elements();
152            while (elements.hasNext()) {
153                secure(elements.next());
154            }
155            return arrayNode;
156        }
157        else {
158            return node;
159        }
160    }
161
162    /**
163     * Pretty prints a given JSON string.
164     *
165     * @param json JSON code as String which should be formatted
166     * @return <code>json</code> formatted
167     */
168    public static String prettyPrint(final String json) {
169        return executing(() -> {
170            final ObjectMapper jsonParser = new ObjectMapper();
171            final JsonNode jsonTree = jsonParser.readValue(json, JsonNode.class);
172            secure(jsonTree);
173            final ObjectWriter writer = jsonParser.writerWithDefaultPrettyPrinter();
174            return writer.writeValueAsString(jsonTree);
175        });
176    }
177
178    public static <T> T executing(final SupplierThrowingIOException<T> supplier) {
179        try {
180            return supplier.get();
181        }
182        catch (final IOException e) {
183            throw new JsonException(e);
184        }
185    }
186
187    @FunctionalInterface
188    public interface SupplierThrowingIOException<T> {
189        T get() throws IOException;
190    }
191}
